pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Implementation of the Stratification Index // An implementation of the stratification index proposed by Zhou (2012) DOI:10.1177/0081175012452207. The package provides two functions, srank, which returns stratum-specific information, including population share and average percentile rank; and strat, which returns the stratification index and its approximate standard error. When a grouping factor is specified, strat also provides a detailed decomposition of the overall stratification into between-group and within-group components.
